issue.title: [Gandiva] add travis entry for gandiva on OSX
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3469](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3469). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-3382 adds a travis job for gandiva on ubuntu. We need to do the same for OSX.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3469?focusedCommentId=16650623) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
`[~pravindra]` I've been adding `[Gandiva]` to a lot of Gandiva JIRA titles. If you could do this when creating them it would be a help. The JIRA titles are what show up in the changelog (https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md) so this helps us keep an clean and readable changelog

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3469?focusedCommentId=16651266) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
